review: Great device. It essentially is just like having your kindle on your television. The only thing that I dislike and was a bit misguided on was that it does have to be plugged with a power cord. I was under the impression that itt only had to be plugged into the USB port of the TV and that was it. I hate having cords cluttered and having the stick was what I looked forward to the most., having a cordless device. Install and set up was easy. It was a bit of a struggle getting the back off of the remote but once it was off then back on after the batteries were put in, I had no troubles. If you can get passed the cord plug in, it is perfect to have!
